name: Fall Alert
description: A leading provider of personal emergency
overview:
Mission Statement

We are committed to providing seniors with affordable and reliable protection so that they may remain living independently at home. How it Works

The medical alert system from Fall Alert helps thousands of senior citizens nationwide to regain a sense of security and independence. By pushing the emergency medical alert button help will arrive within minutes. You can hang the medical alert device from your neck or wear it around your wrist. The peace of mind that fall alert medical alert device gives, is irreplaceable. Benefits

Rest assured, Fall Alert’s certified medical alert monitoring center has 911 certified trained operators on call 24 hours a day. Our operators are trained to dispatch your local paramedics, fire, & police as well as contact your responsible parties list which can include family members, neighbors, and friends.
